contents:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed. Cf. Graysneak v. Heard, 422 Pa. 111, 220 A. 2d 893 (1966), and Stouffer v. Morrison, 400 Pa. 497, 162 A. 2d 378 (1960).
Mr. Justice Roberts dissents for the reasons noted in Ms dissenting opinions in Smeltz v. Harrisburg, 440 Pa. 224, 226, 269 A. 2d 466, 468 (1970) and Laughner v. Allegheny County, 436 Pa. 572, 261 A. 2d 607 (1970).
Mr. Justice Pomeroy dissents.
